overview:
Danny leverages extensive marketing experience with and a deep understanding of leadership that brings people together to deliver measurable results.

He specializes in combining strategic thinking with data analysis to optimize an organization’s sales and marketing efforts and drive ROI.

iWatchLife is an low-bandwidth intelligent video monitoring solution that helps watch your family, property, pets, contractors, parents by allow you to only See What Mattersâ„¢.

Start by using your own webcam or purchase one of our wireless internet cameras and let our cloud-based service notify you when there is action.

You can designate privacy zones and intrusion zones within the frame. Share your views with family and friends.

We are set to re-launch in late January 2011.
